summary:
Just a simple mod to celebrate the release of the Creation Kit. All it does is to add a one-hit kill bow at the Skyforge in Whiterun. It also adds a chest with some arrows. There is nothing special about this mod and it uses the Ebony Bow\'s model and texture. The bow doesn\'t weigh anything.

EDIT: For some reason will firing it jump your archer
descriptionHtml:
Just a simple mod to celebrate the release of the Creation Kit. All it does is to add a one-hit kill bow at the Skyforge in Whiterun. It also adds a chest with some arrows. There is nothing special about this mod and it uses the Ebony Bow\'s model and texture. The bow doesn\'t weigh anything.

EDIT: For some reason will firing it jump your archery to 100 instantly. I don\'t know why, but just a warning.

iNSTALLATION:
Use NMM or add it in the Skyrim/Data directory and activate it with the Skyrim Launcher/data files.
author: Craxmerax
